subject: Hi all, on behalf of local residents, we‚Äôve raised a petition asking Westminster City Council to sanction the use of the lovely yet under-utilised Paddington Street Gardens North in Marylebone as an official dog park, thus giving the community a
body:
much-needed venue where our four-legged friends can exercise and socialise with other dogs and humans alike.

This will come at little to no cost to the Council, while delivering countless benefits in terms of community cohesion, animal welfare, mental health and neighbourhood appeal.

You can read more about the area and the benefits this change would bring by clicking here: https://tinyurl.com/2hmrextk

Please join us by signing the official petition at this link: https://committees.westminster.gov.uk/mgEPetitionDisplay.aspx?id=301

Thanks for your support!

subject: Hi Neighbours,
body:
I am looking to recruit several members of staff over the next coming weeks. 
- A Head Chef 
- Social Media Assistance 
- Ad Hoc waiting/service staff 

I have a position available for a kitchen assistant/server in Central London. 

Job Opportunity Start Date: ASAP 
Times: Monday ‚Äì Friday | 7AM ‚Äì 4PM
Location: Unit 1: The Carousel - W1T 1RL | Unit 2: W1K 6DE
Role Description:
This is a full-time role, paying ¬£11.25PH, 

Plated Events is an event catering company, we have recently expanded to introduce Plated Taqueria ‚Äì Mexican Lunch  A quick, fresh and healthy lunch option for visiting and local residents and
business.
Starting at unit 1 ‚Äì 
‚Ä¢ Assisting in the food preparation process
‚Ä¢ Cooking and preparing elements of high-quality dishes
‚Ä¢ Preparing vegetables, meats, and fish
‚Ä¢ Assisting other Chefs
‚Ä¢ Helping with deliveries and restocking
‚Ä¢ Assisting with stock rotation cleaning stations
‚Ä¢ Contributing to maintaining kitchen and food safety standards.
Logistics:
‚Ä¢ Transporting Plated Taqueria ingredients and dishes from unit 1 to unit 2.
Plated Taqueria Vendor
‚Ä¢ Provide an efficient, friendly service to our customers and prepare and deliver a product that
meets and exceeds customers‚Äô expectations.
‚Ä¢ Maintain a professional relationships with with surrounding businesses and
residents.
‚Ä¢ Food preparation prepare vegetables, Bain maries, display fridge, prepare meat setups, and
ensure front counter is well stocked with fresh produce.
‚Ä¢ Food Safety Management
‚Ä¢ Cash handling
‚Ä¢ Cleaning of all food related area.
‚Ä¢ Co-ordinate with delivery partners to ensure smooth service.

Please send over your CV & Covering letter to events@plated-events.com

Many thanks for reviewing

subject: Summer Sublet Seeker!
body:
Hey everyone, I'm a university student studying abroad at LSE this summer looking for a single bedroom or studio to sublet in July and August around Central London. I'm a tidy and well kept person, and can also help walk dogs! Please get in touch!

Budget: ideally ¬£700-800 p/m on the upper end
Dates : July 9 - August 18, or anytime in between

Thank you all!
